title: The Diocese of Chicago ready an ideal welcome for the Main Archbishop Mar Raphael Attchi - World Today News
text:
Chicago: Main Archbishop Mar Raphael Hattil, head and father of the Syro Malabar Church, whoâ€™s visiting Rupata on a particular invitation from the Diocese of Chicago Mar Pleasure Allapat, is warmly welcomed, after being despatched the publish of Principal Archbishop of the Syro Malabar Church. the bishops, monks, devotees and lay individuals in Chicago Rupata.
On Saturday 6 July at ten oâ€™clock within the morning on the Cathedral of St. Thomas, the Main Archbishop might be taken to the churchyard with talapoli, chendamelas and muthukudas. Then at 10.30 am the Abhiwandya fathers and monks will provide a celebratory neighborhood sacrifice.
After the Holy Mass there might be a consecration assembly and a love feast for all. The President of Rupata Mar Pleasure Alappat, the members and advisory physique of the Rupata Curia introduced that they sincerely invite the parishioners of the diocese (monks, consecrated individuals, parishioners, members of the Rupata Pastor Council, and lay individuals) to the blessed presence of Father Mar Raphael, whoâ€™s visiting Chicago Rupata for the primary time after assuming the workplace of Archbishop.
The President of the Diocese Mar Pleasure Alappat requested everybody to take part on this program with ardour and make it profitable.
